H0.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Rocky

H1.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Sparky

H2.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Rex

H3.text: What was the name of the Flintstones' pet. Dino

A4.text: Dino is a pet dinosaur of the series' main characters, Fred and Wilma Flintstone.

A5.text: Dino debuted in the opening credits of the pilot episode of The Flintstones, but is not mentioned by name until the first season's fourth episode, 'No Help Wanted'.
